mapper.select: SELECT T1.FILE_IDX , T1.ITEM_IDX , T1.FILE_NAME , CONCAT( (SELECT PATH FROM PATH WHERE PATH_NAME='FILE_ROOT') , "\\" , T3.COMPANY_NAME , "[" , T3.COMPANY_IDX , "]\\전용품목") FILE_PATH FROM INVENTORY_FILE T1 JOIN INVENTORY_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_IDX = T2.ITEM_IDX JOIN COMPANY T3 ON T2.COMPANY_IDX = T3.COMPANY_IDX WHERE T1.FILE_IDX = #{file_idx}
